dublinCore.dc:title: 115 HR 3137 IH: Promoting Women in STEM Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Kildee (for himself, Ms. Slaughter, and Mr. Ted Lieu of California) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Education and the Workforce

form.official-title: To amend the Carl D. Perkins Career and Technical Education Act of 2006 to increase the participation of women in science, technology, engineering, and mathematics occupations.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Promoting Women in STEM Act.

section.header: Support for programs that increase the participation of women in science, technology, engineering, and mathematics occupations
section.text: Section 124(b) of the Carl D. Perkins Career and Technical Education Act of 2006 (20 U.S.C. 2344(b)) is amendedâ€”

paragraph.text: in paragraph (8), by striking and at the end;
in paragraph (9), by striking the period at the end and inserting ; and; and
by adding at the end the following:
supporting programs that increase the participation of women in career and technical education programs leading to occupations in science, technology, engineering, and mathematics.
